tosdr.case: court of law is in location X
tosdr.tldr: Ordinarily, UK YouTube users are bound by English law for any legal matter arising from the Terms of Service. However, YouTube retains a right to apply for urgent legal remedies in any jurisdiction. Also, YouTube shares a universal privacy policy with Google and this policy relates to Google's terms which are governed by California laws and jurisdiction.

topics.description: What is the jurisdiction, what laws govern the terms?

topics.name: Jurisdiction and governing laws
topics.subtitle: Where can you sue, or be sued, for breaching of the rules?
